sentences.en: A few snide comments and you just vanish without a trace or a name?
sentences.cn: 说一些冷嘲热讽的话然后就不留姓名地消逝?

sentences.en: And you want to snide but you have to sigh.
sentences.cn: 你想笑却不行不唉声叹气.

sentences.en: Everyone I talked to in the company seemed a little gun-shy, perhaps fearing that I was yet another snide reporter.
sentences.cn: 公司里同我交谈过的人看上去都有一些提心吊胆，也许担心我是又一位用心险恶的记者。

sentences.en: He made a snide comment about her weight.
sentences.cn: 他说了一句很刻薄的话评论她的体重。

sentences.en: He made a snide remark about Aunt Martha's figure.
sentences.cn: 关于玛莎阿姨的身材,他说的话真刻毒.

sentences.en: He's always making snide comments about her appearance.
sentences.cn: 他总是对她的外表冷嘲热讽.

sentences.en: Her new boyfriend is a snide merchant.
If anyone made any more snide remarks he would beat him up.
sentences.cn: 假若他们之中有敢再说闲话的,揍!

sentences.en: In addition, they kept their antennae up for objections or snide comments from Mom or Dad.
sentences.cn: 除此以外, 他们也小心地等待着来自妈妈或爸爸的反对或含沙射影的评论.

sentences.en: She couldn't tell if he was being snide, so she took the question straight.
sentences.cn: 她拿不准他是不是在讽刺她，便干脆按字面去理解这个问题。

sentences.en: There's no need to be snide.
sentences.cn: 用不着再作无谓的讽刺了.

sentences.en: They kept making snide remarks about each other.
Will you lay off from your snide remarks?
sentences.cn: 你别再挖苦了好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Wintergreen was a snide little punk who enjoyed working at cross - purposes.
sentences.cn: 温特格林是个不诚实的小无赖,专喜欢制造矛盾.

trans.tran_cn: 讽刺的，嘲弄的， 贬低的，低劣的
trans.tran_en: if you say something snide, you say something unkind, often in a clever, indirect way

trans.tran_cn: 骗子, 卑鄙勾当, 赝品, 假珠宝
